item.description:
Come see rock/folk band Jack Kelly and the Three Beer Experience play at
Cafe Nine to raise funds for Brighter World Books, a non-profit organization
founded by NHC member Melissa Weiner, to provide books to schools in South
Africa.

Cost: $5 - 100% of proceeds go to Brighter World Books

BWB will also be holding a raffle with GREAT prizes from local businesses:

Ashley¹s ­ 3 $10 gift certificates
Atticus Books ­ $25 gift certificate & t-shirt
Basta ­ Martinis and calamari for two
Bru Café - $10 gift certificate
Claire¹s ­ Breakfast for two
Denali - $50 gift certificate
Devil¹s Gear ­ T-shirt and 10% discount certificate
Enclave - $50 gift certificate
Labyrinth Books - $10 gift certificate and tote bag
Prime 16 - $25 gift certificate
Trailblazer - $75 gift certificate
Willoughby¹s ­ 4 bag coffee bean sampler

Tickets are only $1 each!!!

If you can't attend but would still like to buy raffle tickets, or have any
other questions about the event, contact Melissa at
melissa@brighterworldbooks.org. You can also get more info or make a
donation at www.brighterworldbooks.org.

Melissa will be the contact for this event at 203.232.9626
item.name: Rock Benefit at Cafe Nine
